climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: MULTIFUNCTIONAL MUSICAL INSTRUMENT: This kids xylophone can be played in variety of ways. The kids can fetch balls as pounding sends the balls tinkling over or they can pull out the keyboard and xylophone and play a solo
FINE MOTOR SKILLS DEVELOPMENT: Promotes dexterity, hand eye coordination, manipulation, arm movement, cause and effect
ESTABLISH MUSICALITY: This pounding toys for toddlers encourages musical development and exploration, audio recognition and play
CHILD SAFE: Durable and child safe, contains water-based paint and has non-toxic finishes
AWARD WINNING: The winner of the 2018 Cribsie Award of favorite first musical toy suitable for ages 12 months to 3 years
body.description: Product Description Hape's Pound and Tap Bench with Slide Out Xylophone is a multifunctional musical delight and sound experience for toddlers.Toddlers ages 12 months to 3 years can explore different notes and sounds by letting the balls fall on the keys or slide out the xylophone to create their own unique sound with a wooden mallet.This musical instrument allows for different sounds and melodies making it the ideal introduction to the exciting world of music for your child.Develop Your Child's Motor SkillsThis wooden toy not only gives toddlers an early music education, but develops important motor skills as well.It develops hand-eye coordination, promotes dexterity, and manipulation.It also introduces problem-solving skills of logic, matching, spatial relationships, critical thinking and understanding of cause and effect.Pound and Tap Bench Material and FinishesHape's musical toy has well-polished surfaces, round edges and sturdy materials to ensure the toy is safe for your child and able to withstand years of pounding and tapping.This musical delight is finished with non-toxic water paint decorated with bright rainbow colours and shapes for your child to enjoy.Award Winning ProductSilver Medal for Mother Baby Awards 2017, IndiaSilver Medal for Best Activity/Developmental Product of National Parenting Product Awards 2015, UK Gold Award in Eco category of Independent Toy 2015, UKGolden Rocking Horse 2011, GermanyWinner of the 2018 Cribsie Award for favorite first musical toySafety & Quality Control -Tensile Test, Chemical Test ,Drop Test ,Bite Force Test Brand Story By Hape

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Classical Musical Toy Many Different Ways To Play Explore the different notes and sounds by letting the balls fall on the keys or slide out the xylophone and create your own melodies with the wooden mallet! With The Pound and Tap Bench, there are many ways to make music! Grasping & Hand-Eye Coordination Develops hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills. Strengthens arm muscles. Early Music Education The Pound and Tap Bench’s sounds and melodies are an ideal introduction to the exciting world of music.

Musical Play For Learning Rounded Shape & Bright Colors Well-polished surfaces, round edges and sturdy materials ensures safe play and years of pounding and tapping. Durable, Water Based Paint Finished with child-safe paint and made using durable wooden materials. The Pound and Tap Bench is a toy that can be enjoyed for years. Safe For Playing Rubber hammer, silicone ring and wooden balls, safe to play.

reviews.reviewerName: Easy to use, bright shimmery colors that add a pop to your alcohol ink masterpiece. I have asl used it to create a beautiful effect with acrylic paint.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wood musical center
reviews.reviewText: Let the band play. All in one music station. Well made wood music station, has multiple instruments in the one unit. Hours of fun dexterity building, eye-hand coordination, noisy fun. Bring out the little musician in your toddler. It is colorful and easy for toddler to move around on his/her own. Your cat might just love it too! Would recommend it on many levels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Babies and Toddlers
reviews.reviewText: My husband purchased this as a Christmas gift for my then 10 month old daughter. She has shape sorting toys but isn't quite big enough to comprehend those yet. This toy allowed her to learn a couple of motor skills, such as pushing the balls through the holes with her hands and clanking two together to make a noise. This may sound silly but the rubber piece that holds the balls into place prevents the balls from falling through obviously so she has time to make the connection that they need force to move. With the toy being wooden it is sturdy enough for her to safely lean on as well. She also pulls the musical piece underneath out on her own now and taps it. I love that she still has time to grow with this to learn how to use the rubber mallet to play music and tap the balls as well. There isn't too much going on with this, no crazy extra noises or distractions. It's a quality gift that will last until we are done having children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made, fun toy
reviews.reviewText: Gave this to my Granddaughter who plays with it every day. Can be taken apart so that she can play the Xylophone. Very sturdy, will hold up a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson becoming a musician
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old grandson loves banging on his new toy. I think he will become a musician some day. It doesn't break no matter how hard he hits it. It is pretty, well made, sturdy and durable. Great gift for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for my 1-year-old
reviews.reviewText: He LOVES this. So many fun things he can do. The only reason I took away one star was because the green ball slot is just a little too large, and sometimes the ball just falls through on it's own. But the wooden balls are amazing - he loves to hit them together and hammer them or push them through onto the xylophone. He also loves sliding the xylophone in and out. Great toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my best friends little toddler for Christmas and the she loves it. I see her playing with it when I visit them. She likes to play with the little balls and make music. It is made of wood and metal. The quality is sturdy and wouldn't be broken easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speech therapy toy!
reviews.reviewText: My kids at work love this toy! It’s well made and durable. It’s tons of fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute toy!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this toy for my one year old, but my four year old has also enjoyed it. It is great quality, and I really like that you can take the xylophone out and use it separately. Plus it came with a fun set of instructions so you can play songs on the xylophone when your child is older. So far we love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: es fácil de usar para un niño pequeño
reviews.reviewText: Para mi nieto de un año, aunque está chiquito le atrapó

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has proved to be a big hit with our son. He is almost 1 and he loves to try and hammer the balls through and to play the xylophone bit that pulls out. Nice and colourful and feels sturdy/good quality too
Xilófono perfecto para bebés de menos de un año,éxito seguro.Ademas de buen colorido y buenos materiales

reviews.reviewTitle: Must have Spielzeug! langer Spielspaß und gute Verarbeitung
reviews.reviewText: Ich hatte zunächst eine Klopfbank mit Xylophon eines anderen Herstellers bestellt, da dort die Kugeln kaum und mit extremer Kraft von erwachsenen durchgedrückt werden konnten habe ich diese von Hape bestellt. Hier sind die Kugeln leicht mit der Hand durchzudrücken, was deutlich Kind gerechter ist und zu keinem Frust führt.Das Kind konnte bereits mit 10 Monaten damit spielen und hatte Freude ein Spielzeug im sitzen zu haben und die Kugeln rauf und runter zu nehmen. Anschließend wurden die Kugeln von Hand durchgedrückt und das Xylophon wurde entdeckt. Auch nach 3 Monaten wird immer noch gerne damit gespielt, es kann einzeln mit dem hammerspiel und dem Xylophon gespielt werden oder in Kombination.Ich kann das Spielzeug sehr empfehlen und es gehört zu unseren Top Must have Spielzeugen.

Ho acquistato questo xilofono per mio figlio di 10 mesi, è molto robusto e il suono dello xilofono davvero piacevole, inoltre viene fornito di un libricino con delle canzoncine che si possono riprodurre molto facilmente. Il mio bimbo lo adora, si diverte molto a suonarlo con le palline in dotazione
